Title: A Gift For Old Hillpaw
Description:
Old Hillpaw has about a million chickens on his farm... but that's not what he REALLY loves.

I saw. He collects blue feathers.

I don't realy know where to get a blue feather around here, but I do know where to find some blue pearls!

Check the oysters in Cattail Lake to the northwest. I'm sure a blue pearl will look nice with his feather collection!
PortraitGiverText: That old guy sure likes chickens.
